operation.name: Insert
operation.sql: INSERT INTO chat_invites (chat_id, admin_id, link, permanent, revoked, request_needed, start_date, expire_date, usage_limit, usage2, requested, title, date2) VALUES (:chat_id, :admin_id, :link, :permanent, :revoked, :request_needed, :start_date, :expire_date, :usage_limit, :usage2, :requested, :title, :date2)

operation.name: SelectListByAdminId
operation.sql: SELECT id, chat_id, admin_id, link, permanent, revoked, request_needed, start_date, expire_date, usage_limit, usage2, requested, title, date2 FROM chat_invites WHERE chat_id = :chat_id AND admin_id = :admin_id

operation.name: SelectByLink
operation.sql: SELECT id, chat_id, admin_id, link, permanent, revoked, request_needed, start_date, expire_date, usage_limit, usage2, requested, title, date2 FROM chat_invites WHERE link = :link

operation.name: SelectListByChatId
operation.sql: SELECT id, chat_id, admin_id, link, permanent, revoked, request_needed, start_date, expire_date, usage_limit, usage2, requested, title, date2 FROM chat_invites WHERE chat_id = :chat_id

operation.name: Update
operation.sql: UPDATE chat_invites SET cMap = :cMap WHERE chat_id = :chat_id AND link = :link

operation.name: DeleteByLink
operation.sql: DELETE FROM chat_invites WHERE chat_id = :chat_id AND link = :link

operation.name: DeleteByRevoked
operation.sql: DELETE FROM chat_invites WHERE chat_id = :chat_id AND admin_id = :admin_id AND revoked = 1
